values: 公民的；民事的（非刑事的）；民用的；国内的；市民的；平民的；国民的；国家的；政府的（非宗教或军事的）；文明的；有礼貌的；客气的；依民法的；历法规定的；习俗规定的

synonym.mean: 公民的；民间的；文职的；有礼貌的；根据民法的

sample.mean: adj. 城镇的；市政的；市府的；市民的；本镇居民的；当地居民的
n. 客气；礼貌；客套；寒暄
v. 使…文明；开化；文明的；有礼的
n. 文明；文化；文明进程；特定地区的社会、文化、生活方式；舒适便捷的现代生活

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 教化；使…文明；启发（civilize的过去分词）

word_mean_info__list.difference: 普通常用词，指言论举止无论何时均严谨有礼，很有教养。
语气弱于polite，着重只达到社交的一般要求，避免粗鲁。
指言谈举止典雅，谦恭有礼，更侧重考虑他人的感情与尊严。

word_group.brief_definition: 民事权利, 公民权利, 民权
民权运动；公民权利运动
(政府)文职部门, 行政机构
文职人员, 公务员, 公仆
民航；民用航空；航空民事
民间社会；公民社会；民权社会
民事权利；民法权利；公民权利

bilingual.source: The civil code outlines the basic rights and duties of citizens.
bilingual.target: 民法典规定了公民的基本权利和义务。

bilingual.source: If you are not a religious person, if you have got divorced and you want to get married again, or if you are gay, you must get married in a civil ceremony.
bilingual.target: 如果你不是一个信教的人，如果你已经离婚了，你想再结婚，或者你是同性恋，那么你必须在一个公民的仪式上结婚。

bilingual.source: Under a military regime, civil liberty may be severely curtailed.
bilingual.target: 在军事政权统治下, 公民的自由可能会被严重剥夺.

bilingual.source: Ensuring rights of civil litigation reasonably and effectively is of quite importance of playing the role in protecting the fairly civil rights.
bilingual.target: 合理而有效地保障公民的民事起诉权，对于保护公民合法民事权益具有重要意义。

bilingual.source: Civil right or civil public right which mainly means the right of participating in national political, are the government control and political defense right.
bilingual.target: 公民权或公民的公权利，主要是参与国家政治的权利，是公民的政治参与权和政治防卫权。

bilingual.source: Just as Hegel said, "The aim of a nation is to seek civil happiness."
bilingual.target: 正如黑格尔所说：“国度的目的在于谋求公民的幸福。”

bilingual.source: Of, relating to, or belonging to a city, a citizen, or citizenship; municipal or civil.
bilingual.target: 城市的，公民的城市的、公民的或公民义务的，与其相关的；城市的或公民的。

bilingual.source: In these cases, civil disobedience may be necessary in order to bring attention to the situation.
bilingual.target: 在这种情况下，为了引起人们的注意，公民的抵制是必要的。

bilingual.source: To disregard this principle is to make civil disobedience not only legally wrong but morally unjustifiable.
bilingual.target: 假如不尊重这一原则,那么公民的非暴力反抗不仅在法律上是错误的,在道德上也是不恰当的.

bilingual.source: Politic participations of the civil is the necessary content in developing socialistic democratic politics.
bilingual.target: 公民的政治参与是发展社会主义民主政治的应有之意。

yingyinNormal.en: You realize what you're doing is. Civil, not criminal.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你知道你这么做是，民事罪，不是刑事罪。

yingyinNormal.en: It doesn't have to be teaching, you know? There's the Civil Service.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不一定要献身教育，你知道吗? 还可以做公务员。

yingyinNormal.en: You're Mr. Sweeney's lawyer, isn't that correct? It is. His civil lawyer.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是斯威尼先生的律师，对吗？对，他的民事律师。

yingyinNormal.en: Good morning, Jackie. Good morning. Richard Russell? Civil Rights Act, 1963.
yingyinNormal.zh: 早上好，Jackie。早上好。Richard Russell。《民权法案》1963年。

yingyinNormal.en: That fire bankrupted a global arms cooperation. That wreck triggered a civil war.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那起火灾瓦解了一次全球军备合作，那起车祸引发了一场内战。

yingyinNormal.en: Civil liberties are being trampled on in your city. Good people are living in fear.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在你的城市，公民权利正被践踏，好人正活在恐惧之下。

yingyinNormal.en: Gil, please, let's keep this civil. Oh, by the way, if you ever speak disrespectfully again about my wife, I'll kill you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 格尔，别这样，好好说话还有，如果你再对我老婆出言不敬我会杀了你。

yingyinNormal.en: All right, invitation pointlessly offered, invitation declined as expected, everyone's civil, nobody's fighting. Have a nice evening.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好了，毫无意义的邀请说了，不出意料地被谢绝了，大家都很文明，没有人吵架，晚上愉快。

yingyinNormal.en: I read an amusing article about, a Civil War re-enactor, who said that your great-great-grandfather killed a Yankee soldier with his bare hands.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我读过一篇有趣的文章，一个内战情景重现演员，他说你的曾曾祖父赤手杀了一名北方兵。

yingyinNormal.en: So what? I mean if even I can get past that, it shouldn't bother you. And you don't have to like her. You just have to accept the fact that I do. I mean, if you even can't be civil to the woman I love.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那又如何？如果我都无所谓了，你们有什么好在乎的。你们没有必要去喜欢她，只需要接受我喜欢她的事实就可以。如果你们无法对我爱的女人……

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 文明；文化；文明进程；特定地区的社会、文化、生活方式；舒适便捷的现代生活
adj. 文明的；有礼貌的；有教养的
v. 使…文明；开化；文明的；有礼的

word_family.mean: adj. 公民的；市民的；国民的；民用的；客气的；有礼貌的；习俗规定的；历法规定的；国内的

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 民事权利；公民权利；民权
民间社会；公民社会；民权社会

examination_example.sentence: Over 40 different sets of criteria from health, education and <highlight>civil</highlight> society engagement have been measured to get a more rounded assessment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了得到更全面的评估，从健康，教育、公民社会参与等方面采用了40多种不同的标准进行衡量。

examination_example.sentence: Some relatively poor European countries have seen huge improvements across measures including <highlight>civil</highlight> society, income equality and the environment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些相对贫穷的欧洲国家在“文明社会”、“收入平等”和“环境”等方面都有巨大进步。

examination_example.sentence: The norms of culture in Western <highlight>civil</highlight> services suit those who want to stay put but is bad for high achievers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 西方行政机构中的文化标准适合那些追求安稳的人，但对表现优异者不利。

examination_example.sentence: Jimmy Hoffa used to work as a <highlight>civil</highlight> servant.
If the trade unionist Jimmy Hoffa were alive today, he would probably represent <highlight>civil</highlight> servants.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果工会主义者Jimmy Hoffa现在还活着，他很有可能会代表公务员。

examination_example.sentence: We have been actively exercising our <highlight>civil</highlight> rights.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们一直在积极行使我们的公民权利。

word_usage.usage:
civil这个形容词有多方面的意义，其中在法律上表示“民事的”，与“刑事的”相对，如：
a civil court 民事法庭 
civil law 民法

examination_example.sentence: The Ebro Delta, in Spain, famous as a battleground during the Spanish <highlight>Civil</highlight> War, is now the setting for a different contest.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在西班牙内战期间作为战场而闻名的西班牙埃布罗河三角洲，现在变成了另一个不同的争战之地。

not connected with its armed forces

examination_example.sentence: The International <highlight>Civil</highlight> Aviation Organization suggests that countries use a suitable type, size and style for official documents like passports.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 国际民用航空组织建议各国在护照等官方文件中使用合适的类型、大小和样式。

examination_example.sentence: America's National Transportation Safety Board found that 73% of the incidents in its <highlight>civil</highlight>-aviation database occurred on a crew's first day of flying together.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 美国国家运输安全委员会发现，它的民航数据库中有73%的事故发生在机组人员一起飞行的首日。

sense_info_list.zh: 习俗规定的; 历法规定的

examination_example.sentence: According to a paper in 2011 by Mr Hsiang and co-authors, <highlight>civil</highlight> conflict is related to El Nino's harmful effects.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 2011年，项先生及其合著者的一篇论文指出，国内冲突与厄尔尼诺现象的有害影响有关。

examination_example.sentence: It lasted for more than a year, and kicked off the <highlight>civil</highlight>-rights movement.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它持续了一年多的时间，拉开了民权运动的序幕。

examination_example.sentence: Chris Lewis will explain how Brindley made such a positive contribution to the education of that group of early "<highlight>civil</highlight> engineers".
examination_example.sentence_trans: Chris Lewis将解释Brindley是如何对那群早期“土木工程师”的教育做出如此积极的贡献。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 民事权利；公民权利；民权

sense_info_list.en: relating to ordinary citizens and their concerns, as distinct from military or ecclesiastical matters

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>Civil</highlight> Code gathers them into one unified document and makes improvements.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 《民法典》将它们汇集到一个统一的文件中，并进行了改进。

examination_example.sentence: With the <highlight>Civil</highlight> Code，China hopes to set up a country under the rule of law with better protection for <highlight>civil</highlight> rights.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 中国希望通过《民法典》建立一个法治国家，来更好地保障公民权利。

examination_example.sentence: Ruby grew up to be a <highlight>civil</highlight> rights activist.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 鲁比长大后成为一名民权积极分子。
